headline: Sentiment down 308% this week, optimism declining
key_insights: Frustrations trending up 2067% over 7 days (strong momentum)
Alert: Overall sentiment has significantly increased (z=2.16)
sentiment_commentary:
• Frustrations dominate with 142 quotes, including 121 at strong intensity - people are expressing serious anger and dissatisfaction today.

• Despite the high activity, frustration levels dropped significantly from yesterday's peak and remain well within the typical range for this period.

• Fears plummeted from yesterday's high to below average, while optimism continued declining to near its 45-day low.
methodology: See METHODOLOGY.md. Scores use z-score normalization with empirically-derived intensity weights from analytics_config.yaml. Alerts at |z| >= threshold (configurable, default 2.0 for p < 0.05).
